originalData: Texas, Confederate Pension Applications, 1899-1975. Vol. 1–646 & 1–283. Austin, Texas: Texas State Library and Archives Commission.
sourceDescription: Pension records for the soldiers or their widows who served in the Confederate Army during the Civil War are contained in this index. Information that may be found includes names, counties of residence, approved pension numbers, rejected pension numbers, etc. Learn more...
